objects.text:
• 925 Silver with Rose Gold Finish
• Elegant Pink Drop Design
• Certificate of Authenticity

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner displays a promotional layout for a jewelry product, split into two visually distinct halves. The left side uses a soft pink gradient with scattered pastel circular accents and features layered text elements. The topmost layer "tagline" uses bold uppercase typography in coral pink. Below, the "heading" in magenta introduces the product. The "description" layer presents three bullet points in subtle grey, detailing key features. Prominently displayed below is the “price” in a bold magenta futuristic font. The “rating” follows in star format. A magenta rounded rectangle (layer "cta_background") hosts a white "SHOP NOW" label ("cta"). Below, the "subheading" suggests the product's gifting purpose. On the right half, the "product_image" visually presents the earrings on a clean gradient background, separated by a pink dotted vertical line.

**Color Palette**:
- Blush Pink (#FFF0F5)
- Misty Rose (#FFE4E1)
- Deep Pink (#C2185B)
- Coral Red (#E57373)
- Charcoal Gray (#4A4A4A)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a delicate pair of earrings with a refined blend of soft blush pink, rose gold, and brilliant crystal white tones. The pink hue (#F8B7B9) forms the main petal-like structure, giving a romantic and feminine touch. Surrounding crystals are rendered in sparkling diamond white (#FFFFFF) with slight hints of icy blue (#E3F1F9), highlighting brilliance and clarity. Rose gold (#E78B8B) outlines and connects the elements, unifying the components with warmth and elegance. The image harmoniously blends soft and luminous textures, enhancing contrast while maintaining a graceful cohesion. A banner can use this palette for elegance and sophistication.
